title: Special patches

properties.name: description
properties.value: Many varieties of unique farming patches exist across Gielinor, used exclusively for growing very specific plants. Most often, only a single type of seed can be planted in these patches; though some, such as the Anima patch, have a few seeds available.

content:
The Vinery, the location of grape patches, one of the many unique patch types in Old School RuneScape

Many varieties of unique farming patches exist across Gielinor, used exclusively for growing very specific plants. Most often, only a single type of seed can be planted in these patches; though some, such as the Anima patch, have a few seeds available.

The mechanics of each specific patch may also be different than similar patches more familiar to the player. For example the celastrus tree, while having celastrus bark to harvest, has a variable yield and doesn't regenerate, making it unlike regular or fruit trees.

Contents

Special seeds[edit | edit source]

Level Seed Protection Growth time[n 1] Experience Uses
Plant Check-health Harvest Total
23
Giant seaweed
Numulite × 200 		4 × 10 mins 19 N/A 21 40[n 2]
  • Used to make soda ash for molten glass
36
Grapes 		Free 7 × 5 mins 31.5 625 40 400[n 3]
  • Cooking ingredient
53
Mushroom 		N/A 6 × 40 mins 61.5 N/A 57.7 407.7[n 4]
  • Cooking ingredient
63
Belladonna 		N/A 4 × 80 mins 91 N/A 512 603
  • Weapon poison++ ingredient
65
Hespori 		Immune 3 × 640 mins 62 N/A 12600 12,662[n 5]
  • Spawns Hespori
  1. ^ N×X mins means the crop will grow a little for each X minutes. This happens N times until it is fully grown.
  2. ^ 6-53 giant seaweeds are harvested per patch.
  3. ^ Assumes 10 grapes are harvested.
  4. ^ 6 Bittercap mushrooms are harvested at a time.
  5. ^ Once fully grown, it will grow into the Hespori, a demi-boss that can be defeated for 12,600 Farming experience.

Anima seeds[edit | edit source]

Level Seed Protection Growth time[n 1] Experience Effect
Plant Check-health Harvest Total
76
Kronos 		Immune 8 × 640 mins[n 2] 100 N/A N/A 100
  • Provides a chance for farming patches to skip a growth stage.
76
Iasor 		Immune 8 × 640 mins[n 2] 100 N/A N/A 100
  • Decreases the chance of farming patches becoming diseased.
76
Attas 		Immune 8 × 640 mins[n 2] 100 N/A N/A 100
  • Increases the yield of farming patches.
  1. ^ N×X mins means the crop will grow a little for each X minutes. This happens N times until it is fully grown.
  2. ^ 2.0 2.1 2.2 Anima plant effects are active as soon as they are planted. Over their life span of 85.3 hours (three and a half days), they grow from a seedling into a withering state. The withering state is one stage away from death; once it dies, they must be replanted to gain the effects once more.

Cactus patches[edit | edit source]

Cactus patches can grow cactus seeds (55 Farming) and potato cactus seeds (64 Farming).

Location Closest teleport Image

Minigame and raids patches[edit | edit source]

Type Activity Location Seeds
Tithe patch Tithe Farm Hosidius Golovanova seeds, Bologano seeds and Logavano seeds
Herb patch Chambers of Xeric Mount Quidamortem Golpar seeds, Buchu seeds and Noxifer seeds

Spirit tree patches[edit | edit source]

Main article: Spirit Tree (Farming)

Players can grow a single spirit tree at level 83 Farming, two at level 91, and an unlimited amount at level 99.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
28 April 2016
(update | poll)

It is now possible to add compost or supercompost to any farming patch during any growth stage of a crop.
